About Le

Le is head of data science at AMD, where he builds scalable data analytical and artificial intelligence tools on cloud platform and data-driven accelerators for solving enterprise-level business problems.

Thinkloud

Thinkloud is created and mainted by Le, to share knowledge, resources, and (maybe) random thoughts about data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.
